posts.title: Calm The Fuck Down Coloring Book
posts.content: Let your irreverent sense of humor run wild without ruffling any feathers by unwinding with this “Calm The Fuck Down” coloring book. It comes full of beautiful patterns that are complemented by sassy quips such as “Something to do until the Valium kicks in”.

posts.title: Fake Parking Tickets
posts.content: Give your fellow drivers a good scare by pranking them using these fake parking tickets. Printed on a thick, durable cardboard, each parking ticket is detailed enough to fool even the sharpest eyes when viewed from a distance.

posts.title: Liquid Plastic Welder
posts.content: Repair broken cables in seconds using the liquid plastic welder. Unlike glue that sticks everywhere and dries up too quickly, the plastic inside the welder remains in liquid form until you’re ready to make your repairs and cure it using the built-in UV LED light.

posts.title: Doorway Workout Station
posts.content: Sculpt the body of your dreams from the comfort of home by outfitting your door with this doorway workout station. It sets up in a snap and comes with a full dip station, abdominal station, and a pull and push station for a total body workout.

posts.title: Titan Trash Compactor
posts.content: Reduce the volume of garbage your home produces by upgrading to the Titan trash compactor. It features a patented, hygienic compaction system that allows it to hold over 3 times more garbage than a regular trash bin of the same size after compression.

posts.title: Portable Gaming Unit
posts.content: Play your favorite games no matter where you are by always making sure you have the portable gaming unit at your side. Wherever you go, you’ll be able to eradicate boredom in one fell swoop as you enjoy your favorite titles on the 19 inch LED display.

posts.title: Stained Underwear Wallet
posts.content: Keep your valuables hidden where nobody would want to look with the stained underwear wallet. These doo-doo stained tighty whiteys will allow you to keep your valuables in plain sight, and are great for ensuring your stuff is left alone by security while traveling by plane.

posts.title: The Portable Suana
posts.content: Enjoy a detoxifying steam in the comfort of your own home with the portable sauna. It comes with energy efficient carbon fiber heating panels that you can set to one of five pre-set levels, and features special padded openings for your head and hands for utmost comfort.

posts.title: Mini Watermelon Cucumber Seeds
posts.content: Feel like a giant come harvest time by planting tons of these mini watermelon cucumber seeds in your garden. These Mexican miniature watermelon seeds come to maturity in about 60 days and produce tiny 1-2″ fruits shaped like watermelons.

posts.title: Barrel Cork Catcher Accent Table
posts.content: Show off your fondness for wine to by making this barrel cork catcher accent table part of your living room’s decor. This quaint table stands at 20 inches and comes with a central blackboard plaque so that you can personalize it with a custom message.

posts.title: Zippo Lighter Armor
posts.content: Protect your Zippo’s smooth finish when you venture outdoors by slipping it inside this lighter armor. It features a sturdy heat-resistant reinforced polymer exterior and an O-ring seal that minimizes evaporation while keeping water out.

posts.title: Viewable Root Garden
posts.content: Experience the joy of watching your vegetables grow with this viewable root garden. This kid friendly kit includes everything you need to plant and observe the miracle of science, and makes an excellent gift for the young olericulture enthusiast.
